product_name: Native Eyewear Ward Reflex Polarized Sunglasses
long_description: Inspired by the Colorado climb in their name, these Reflex-coated shades cut glare while preserving definition, so you see more of the terrain when it matters--on loose ground and steep descents.
short_description: Inspired by the Colorado climb in their name, these Reflex-coated shades cut glare while preserving definition, so you see more of the terrain when it matters--on loose ground and steep descents.
